name: sconntop

stmt.origin: syl(wcel(c0, csconn), wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(c0, cpconn))
stmt.pretty: syl(c0 ∈ SConn, c0 ∈ Top, c0 ∈ PConn)

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, csconn), wcel(c0, ctop))
-| wi(wcel(c0, csconn), wcel(c0, cpconn))
-| wi(wcel(c0, cpconn), wcel(c0, ctop))
body.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ SConn → c0 ∈ Top)
⊣ (c0 ∈ SConn → c0 ∈ PConn)
⊣ (c0 ∈ PConn → c0 ∈ Top)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, csconn), wcel(c0, ctop))
-| wi(wcel(c0, csconn), wcel(c0, cpconn))
-| wi(wcel(c0, cpconn), wcel(c0, ctop))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ SConn → c0 ∈ Top)
⊣ (c0 ∈ SConn → c0 ∈ PConn)
⊣ (c0 ∈ PConn → c0 ∈ Top)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, csconn), wcel(c0, ctop))
-| wi(wcel(c0, cpconn), wcel(c0, ctop))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ SConn → c0 ∈ Top)
⊣ (c0 ∈ PConn → c0 ∈ Top)

comment: A simply connected space is a topology. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 11-Feb-2015.)
